name: Slots Vegas Lights - 5 Reel Deluxe Casino

description:
Best Classic Vegas 5 Reel Stepper Slots in the App Store! With Progressive Jackpots and Live Slots Tournaments!

Classic Slots Old Vegas 5 Reel invites you to jump in and WIN BIG on slots that sweep you into the FLASHY, FUN, and FAST-PACED excitement of Vegas! Get caught up in the retro-fueled glow of our action-packed slots - PLUS, you can play longer with generous BONUSES and daily FREE COINS!

> Beautiful mobile HD graphics - bright and intense!
> Authentic old classic Vegas casino themed free slots with mega win paylines!
> Biggest payout in fun bonus games: Free spins, Wheel spins, stacked wilds, and prize picks!
> Our Vegas VIP Perks give you mega bonuses!
> FREE Bonus Coins all the time! Win collective payouts with your friends in our LIVE slots Tournaments!
